A very special thanks for Bodybuilders Powerhouse Gym of McAllen, Texas for providing an awesome meet site and Robert
Jackson for organizing a very efficient and well run meet that was enjoyed by all attending.  Special thanks to our judges, spotters
and loaders for doing an excellent job throughout the day.  Several records were set at this event and a lot of competitors chose to
lift RAW and set some outstanding records in the RAW categories.  Among those recently converting to RAW lifting was Ernesto
Milian.  Ernesto set some big numbers wearing gear and continues to do so lifting RAW.  Stay tuned for the next APA Texas
event which is being scheduled for November.
